name: Hooks
body:
### Welcome to Hooks
Hooks is a rapid development PHP MVC framework. It encompasses the MVC with partials and view components. It has in-built Database Helpers that help you create a project in seconds.

### Current Development
Hooks is on beta v9.x.x now. It is supposed to launch by January 1 as version 1.0


### Authors and Contributors
Project by @tikaPahadi

### Support or Contact
Send an email to tika@akitech.org for more information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
